title: Trellis-back side chair
description: side chair, Sheraton design; open back of \'diamond pattern\'; rectangular panel carved with drapery swags in center of crest rail; straight molded legs taper slightly; underbraced with stretchers; seat upholstered in green silk damask (modern)
creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
